tool_description: Our free BIN checker can help you spot fraudulent credit card transactions. Start verifying, validating, and checking all information of credit/debit cards just using BIN numbers. Our database has over 365,460 unique BINs.

api_list.name: BIN Checker
api_list.description: This API is designed primarily for online store owners who want to perform a deep checking of their credit/debit card transactions, providing insights into the risk level of transactions. Users can send the Bank Identification Number (BIN) to receive detailed information.

required_parameters.name: bin
required_parameters.description: The first 6 digits of a credit/debit card used to identify the issuing bank.

api_list.name: BIN/IP Checker
api_list.description: This API allows users to check the BIN and, if provided, the IP address of the client to assess transaction risk. It returns detailed BIN information along with a risk score based on the IP address.

required_parameters.name: bin
required_parameters.description: The first 6 digits of a credit/debit card used to identify the issuing bank.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: The IP address of the client to assess transaction risk.
